solution_line_template: The total number of cakes baked is {diego_baked} + {donald_baked} = <<{diego_baked}+{donald_baked}={total_baked}>>{total_baked} cakes.
But since Diego ate {cake_eaten} cake, there are {total_baked} - {cake_eaten} = <<{total_baked}-{cake_eaten}={cakes_left}>>{cakes_left} cakes left.
